# [[muscle memory]] {{gloss|physiological adaptation of the body to repetition of a specific physical activity, resulting in increased neuromuscular control when performing that activity again}}
types.html:
mémoire musculaire f (uncountable)

  1. muscle memory (physiological adaptation of the body to repetition of a specific physical activity, resulting in increased neuromuscular control when performing that activity again)

title: mémoire musculaire
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /me.mwaʁ mys.ky.lɛʁ/
